html:
New Delhi

New Delhi, Jan. 12 -- Xiaomi 11T Pro will launch on Amazon in India. Xiaomi's upcoming smartphone 11T Pro will feature Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 chipset. The global VP of Xiaomi, Manu Jain, has announced. The smartphone will be unveiled on January 19 in India. The Chinese smartphone maker will also pack a 120W fast charger inside the box. Xiaomi had already launched it in Chinese market with a different name along with two other smartphones under the Note 11 category. Now, it prepares to launch the Xiaomi 11T Pro in the mid-segment to compete against Realme and Oppo.

As far as the details of Xiaomi 11T Pro are concerned, we know that it will feature a punch hole design display having 120Hz refresh rate. The screen will be AMOLED in nature.

For photography, Xiaomi is looking to pad it up with a 108MP lens in the triple camera slot at the back. The selfie lens could range around 32MP.

Xiaomi might include the 6GB RAM and 128GB ROM combination. Xiaomi 11T Pro is likely to run on Android 11 along with its MIUI skin. Published by HT Digital Content Services with permission from MINT.
